item.title: Behold The Samsung Behold Espresso and Rose
item.description:
It’s understandable why you’re looking for Samsung Behold reviews; it’s one of the most sought-after touchscreen phones on the market. The Samsung Behold is an advanced smartphone featuring Samsung’s innovative TouchWiz interface, taking touchscreen technology to new heights. TouchWiz allows you to personalize your home screen by simply dragging and dropping widgets with your finger, eliminating the need for a mouse or stylus. Beyond its impressive TouchWiz interface, the Samsung Behold offers an array of desirable features for a touchscreen phone...

item.title: Cyber Monday Cell Phone Deals
item.description:
The best deals on cell phones can be found online, especially during sales like Cyber Monday. These limited-time offers on free and discounted phones are valid until midnight today, Monday. For a limited time, get a free BlackBerry Bold 9700 for AT&T after an instant online discount. This offer includes a bonus of free activation for up to five lines, making it perfect for family plans. Prefer a different BlackBerry? The BlackBerry Curve in Titanium or silver is also available...

item.title: Free Cell Phones Galore
item.description:
I’m looking at 26 different cell phones offered by major carriers like AT&T, Sprint, T-Mobile, and Verizon. They vary in model and price, but they all have one key thing in common: they’re free. You might think these are just outdated phones that no one wants, but that’s not the case. For example, there are several BlackBerry models available for free with a new AT&T wireless plan at standard rates. These include the BlackBerry Bold 9700 Black, BlackBerry Curve 8520 Black, and BlackBerry Curve 8900 Silver...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/free-cell-phones-galore/

item.title: HTC HD2 Smartphone With Movies
item.description:
Have you ever been offered a cell phone with two full-length movies already on it? That’s only the beginning of what the HTC HD2 smartphone for T-Mobile offers. This phone doesn’t just offer entertainment, it delivers it in spades! The massive touchscreen display immediately suggests this phone is designed for multimedia. It boasts a 4.3-inch screen with 800 x 480 pixel resolution. Those specs sound more like a small computer than a phone, and that’s a good thing...

item.title: 4G Wireless Quietly Encroaching on 3G
item.description:
Cellular companies are promoting 3G wireless technology as the most advanced available. However, a faster technology called 4G is being gradually introduced across the country. This situation reflects the typical progression of technology, where an invention like wireless data service undergoes continuous advancements. Like early personal computers compared to today’s models, mobile data is following a similar path of growth. Cellular carriers dominate wide-area mobile service due to their extensive network infrastructure...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/4g-wireless-quietly-encroaching-on-3g/

item.title: Is Your Old RAZR Getting Dull?
item.description:
The Motorola RAZR V3, known for its slim profile, is a highly sought-after mobile phone. Its popularity is evident across various carriers, even prepaid services like AT&T’s GoPhone. While the original RAZR remains desirable, those considering an upgrade will find that the RAZR design has evolved. Newer models offer the classic RAZR aesthetic with enhanced features. One notable upgrade is the Motorola RAZR 2 V8 with myFaves, available for T-Mobile. Also called the MOTORAZR, this model boasts a slimmer and more tapered design than its boxy V3 predecessor...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/is-your-old-razr-getting-dull/

item.title: T-Mobile G2 With Google is 4G
item.description:
T-Mobile is raising the bar for smartphones with its new G2, a Google phone that seamlessly integrates with Google Voice. This allows for voicemails to be converted to text and read like emails or texts. Powered by Android 2.2, the G2 boasts a 3.7-inch full touch screen with seven customizable home panels. Users can personalize their experience with thousands of apps and widgets from the Android Market. One of the G2’s standout features is its Adobe Flash Player, unlike a well-known competitor...

item.title: When You Call My Equinox I See Purple
item.description:
With the new Sony Ericsson Equinox Carbon cell phone for T-Mobile, you’ll know who’s calling just by its color. This phone goes beyond Caller ID with its pulsating caller colors. No need to anxiously stare at your phone waiting for a call â€“ just set it down and discreetly watch for your personalized color. You can assign five different colors, like purple, amber, or sapphire, to specific contacts. This way, you can easily see who’s calling with a quick glance, or even pretend you didn’t notice that unwanted call...

item.title: Samsung Memoir Phone Captures Memories
item.description:
We all know the feeling: the best moments always seem to happen when you’re without a camera. That’s why a new cell phone with a built-in camera sounds appealing. While not as high-quality as a dedicated camera, it’s certainly better than nothing. The Samsung Memoir eliminates this dilemma by combining a cell phone and a high-quality camera. Designed for both casual and serious photographers, this touch screen phone boasts an impressive 8...
